reviewText: At first I thought it was silly but I tried it and lost more than 20 pounds in 3 months.  I watch the DVD once a week.  It's a bit like meditation.  I'm less hungry and eat about half what I used to eat and feel full.  This really works for me.
This is the worst hypnosis tape I have ever heard.  It is a DVD with a ridiculous, jerky spiral thing and the repeated message "eat half of what's on your plate".  Not worth the money!
